{{also|Hundert|hûndert}} ==German== {{cardinalbox|de|99|100|101|neunundneunzig|hundertundeins|ord=hundertste}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|hundert}}, ultimately from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*hundaradą}}, from {{m|gem-pro|*hundą}} (< {{inh|de|ine-pro|*ḱm̥tóm}}) + {{m|gem-pro|*radą||count}}. The Duden derives {{cog|gmh|hundert}} from {{etyl|osx|de}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈhʊndɐt/}} * {{audio|de|De-hundert.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} one [[hundred]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|einhundert}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|aberhundert}} * {{l|de|hunderte}} * {{l|de|hundertste}} * {{l|de|Jahrhundert}} * {{l|de|zweihundert|t=two hundred}} * {{l|de|dreihundert|t=three hundred}} * {{l|de|vierhundert|t=four hundred}} * {{l|de|fünfhundert|t=five hundred}} * {{l|de|siebenhundert|t=seven hundred}} * {{l|de|achthundert|t=eight hundred}} * {{l|de|neunhundert|t=nine hundred}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|dsb|hundert|bor=1}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Lower Sorbian== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{w|ENHG|Early New High}} {{bor|dsb|de|hundert}}, from {{der|dsb|gmh|hundert}}, ultimately from {{der|dsb|gem-pro|*hundaradą}}, from {{m|gem-pro|*hundą}} (< {{der|dsb|ine-pro|*ḱm̥tóm}}; cognate with {{cog|dsb|sto}}) + {{m|gem-pro|*radą||count}}. ===Numeral=== {{head|dsb|numeral|cat2=cardinal numbers}} # {{l|en|hundred}} (100) ====Synonyms==== * {{l|dsb|sto}}
